name: @olliecaine/typescript-library-boilerplate
description: A simple tree-shakable TypeScript library boilerplate

scripts.dev:docker: docker run --rm -it -w /app -v ${PWD}:/app $(docker build . -q) sh -c 'npm run dev'
scripts.test: nyc --include src/**/*.ts --extension .ts --require ts-node/register mocha src/**/*.spec.ts && shx rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc -p tsconfig-esm.json && rollup -c rollup.config.js dist/index.js > dist/typescript-library-boilerplate.bundle.js && cp package.json dist && ts-node tools/cleanup.ts && cp README.md dist
scripts.health-check: time concurrently --group --kill-others-on-fail --timings 'npm ci' 'npm run lint --quiet' 'npm run build' 'npm test'
scripts.health-check:docker: docker run --rm -it -w /app -v ${PWD}:/app $(docker build . -q) sh -c 'npm run health-check'

author: goldenbearkin <huihangkin@gmail.com>
